content.paragraph: Player Character — Built all core player systems and components
UI Infrastructure — Created all UI scenes and implemented the underlying logic and navigation
Game Manager — Developed the system controlling the events during the match (including the raining‑items scenario)
Item Infrastructure — Implemented the logic for all interactable and throwable items.
Damage System — Built the damage framework for players and items
Explosions — Created the logic for all explosive items
Destructible Buildings — Designed and implemented fully destructible structures with piece‑by‑piece breakability
Audio System — Implemented and refined the system for managing all sound effects and music
Local Multiplayer — Developed the entire for local multiplayer system
The Tutorial Level — Designed and built the tutorial level, including the slideshow teaching sequence.
The Train Station Level — Designed the Train Station level.
